description:
The mysterious figure continues to taunt Mumei, challenging him to a duel to prove the ultimate power of the Shokatsu Technique. What does this man know about Shokatsu Technique and how might it help Mumei? The lives of Koui and Mumei`s father hangs in the balance as Mumei makes his way to the top of the tower for a showdown with destiny. But why is there a sauna?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goukyuu! Mumei yo, Chichi no Shikabane o Koete Yuke!
Lament, Mumei! Over Your Father`s Dead Body!
Lamentation ! Surmonte la mort de ton père, Mumei !
号泣! 睦明よ, 父の屍を越えてゆけ!
